org.oucs.gaboto.timedim.index
Interface TimeDimensionIndexer

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleTimeDimensionIndexer
public interface TimeDimensionIndexer

Provides an interface for time dimension indexer to work with Gaboto.

Querying the cdg (see Gaboto.getContextDescriptionGraph()) using SPARQL is hardly possible (or at least not feasible). TimeDimensionIndexer relieve Gaboto of that problem by parsing all time information into some Java representation and providing methods to easily query that information.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Arno Mittelbach
See Also:
Gaboto
